articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
As I previewed The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, there was a moment where the first line ever spoken in the series came back to me. The famous quote from an old man in a cave takes on a strange reflection in Zelda's solo outing.


"It's dangerous to go alone," the old man began. We know it well. Those iconic words led to our hero of legend taking up the imparted sword to save the land of Hyrule and its princess, Zelda. The roles are reversed in Echoes of Wisdom, with Zelda taking on the mantle of hero for the first time (let's just say, officially). And as with the first game, she's not going at it alone.


Image via Nintendo


The Adventure of Zelda


I got to play a couple of small sections in The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom while at PAX West. I experienced the start of the ga…
articles.title: Hands-on: The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom puts the princess in the spotlight while paying homage to the past

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
In NBA 2K25, calling a screen will allow you to make your offense a lot more dynamic.


The road to a basket might not always be open, and it gets even more difficult when you're playing against other human opponents. Using a fellow teammate as a screen will help you uncover space on the court that would otherwise have remained blocked. While the core process of calling a screen is pretty much the same, it's worth mastering the basics before you jump into early access.


How to call a screen in NBA 2K25


Calling a screen can be done in two different ways. The easier process is to call a random screen. In that case, the AI will automatically assign a suitable candidate to the screen. A more advanced process involves using a specific player as the screen - preferably your C/PF - as they can…
articles.title: How to set a screen in NBA 2K25?

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
NBA 2K25 is out on early access, but the online modes have run into rough weather.


While the full game is now available for those who have pre-ordered the game, the online modes are out of order. When I tried to connect to the 2K servers on PS5, I kept getting an error on my end. Upon further investigation, it appears that several other players worldwide are also going through the same issues. Here are a few tips and tricks that you can try in the meantime.


What is the NBA 2K25 Can't connect to 2K servers error?


This specific error is well-known to those who have played older NBA 2K titles. This error crops up whenever you can't connect to the 2K servers. Connecting to 2K's official servers is mandatory if you want to enjoy game modes that require online matchmaking.


The error can …
articles.title: NBA 2K25 Can’t connect to 2K servers error – Potential causes and solutions

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
NBA 2K25 is now live on early access, and one of the coolest things to do with your MyPlayer is to give him your face.


While you can customize the looks of your in-game persona as much as you like, it's a different ball game altogether to make him look just like you. If you have played NBA 2K24, you'll pretty much know the process. If you're someone new, read on to find out how to add your real-life face to the game this year.


NBA 2K25 MyPlayer face scan guide


There are two different tasks when it comes to adding your face in NBA 2K25.



Scanning your face.


Use the scanned face to update your MyPlayer face.



The first part is pretty simple, and you'll need the help of the MyNBA 2K Companion app. This app is free, and it's available on both iOS and Android.



Create your MyPlayer account.


Make sure that it's connected to both NBA 2K25 and MyNBA 2K Companion app.


A series of instructions will prompt. Just follow them.


Make sure your face is in a lighted space, and don't move your head unless required.


Keep the phone at an approximate 18" distance.


When turning your face to the side, make sure to turn 45 degrees, and do it slowly.


This should ensure a proper scan of your face.



How to change your MyPlayer face in NBA 2K25?


Once the scan is done, next comes the task of changing your MyPlayer's in-game face.



Start the game and load up MyCareer mode.


Load into MyCity with your MyPlayer.


Pause and go to the Nav menu. Then, select the Appearance option under the MyPlayer tab.


Go to the Appearance tab.


Select the 'Scan Your Face' option, and it will insert the scanned face from your NBA 2K Companion app.



That's all you have to do to make your MyPlayer look just like you inside NBA 2K25.

The post How to scan your face for NBA 2K25 MyPlayer appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to scan your face for NBA 2K25 MyPlayer

articles.author: Moulik Mathur
articles.description:
A Supercharged Slot in No Man’s Sky refers to a technology inventory slot in No Man’s Sky that is capable of increasing the stats of any technology installed on it. If a technology that provides stat buffs is installed on a Supercharged Slot in No Man’s Sky, players would receive an increase on top of the base stats provided by the technology. 


Supercharged Slots


Supercharged Slots are quite useful, and are generally used to increase the stats of S-class or X-class technologies since they provide the most stat boost in the game.


You can find Supercharged Slots in Exosuit, Multi-Tool, Starships, and Freighter technology inventory. Given the capability of a Supercharged Slot to give players more stats than the technology offers at its base level, there are some limitations present, whi…
articles.title: What are Supercharged Slots in No Man’s Sky

articles.author: Moulik Mathur
articles.description:
Black Cat could be the next Marvel character coming to Fortnite. Epic Games is set to release a v31.10 update which will bring new content to the game, including more Marvel skins to obtain. 




New Fortnite Super Styles featuring Captain America and Emma Frost among others are already confirmed for the next update. The Black Cat Fortnite skin features Felicia Hardy in her classic attire, and the reported outfit bundle comes with a Black Cat themed pickaxe, backpack, and guitar. There is also said to be a Black Cat skin coming to LEGO Fortnite too with the upcoming update.


While Black Cat and other skins may have been spotted, that does not necessarily mean that the outfits will be available as soon as the new update drops. Epic Games usually rolls out new skins through rotation of items in the shop, instead of releasing all of these together. As for Black Cat, the expected release date is September 14-15.




Black Cat skin in Fortnite is likely to cost around 2,000 V-Bucks based on the pricing for the Deadpool skin, but there is no set category for pricing by Epic Games, with skins also costing 2,400 V-Bucks (Lewis Hamilton skin) sometimes. The Black Cat Fortnite outfit bundle is going to cost somewhere around 3,000-5,000 V-Bucks.


Fortnite v31.10 update: What to expect


Fortnite is down at the time of writing, undergoing maintenance for the upcoming update. New files are being added to the game, and hence, new leaks are coming out. Leaks suggest the Infinity Gauntlet mythic weapon has been added back to Fortnite. It's also been claimed (via ShiinaBR on X) that a Doctor Doom Loot Island will be coming to the game, alongside a new Doctor Doom outfit called Pandora's Armor Doom. 



The post Black Cat Fortnite skin reportedly releasing with v31.10 update appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Black Cat Fortnite skin reportedly releasing with v31.10 update

articles.author: Moulik Mathur
articles.description:
Fortnite server downtime is set to commence today, as Epic Games prepares for the v31.10 update. If you are trying to log in, and wondering if Fortnite is down and when will Fortnite servers be back up, the downtime is due to the planned maintenance for the v31.10 update.




Epic Games has announced that the game will undergo maintenance at 4 a.m. ET / 1 a.m. PT on September 4, 2024. As usual, matchmaking will be turned off shortly before maintenance kicks off. Fortnite v31.10 is expected to be released roughly 3-4 hours after the downtime commences, based on previous time gaps between Fortnite downtime and update release.


The upcoming update is already poised to introduce new Fortnite Super Level styles for various existing outfits in the game, such as Captain America and Emma Frost. The Fortnite Super Level styles are typically unlocked once players progress past level 100 in the ongoing battle pass. 




There have been several rumours surrounding the upcoming update, with players expecting Sabretooth Meowscles skin to arrive. For those unfamiliar, Meowscles is an original Fortnite skin, which is said to receive a variant skin in which Meowscles is also Sabretooth, the brother of Wolverine from Marvel Comics.


Speaking of Marvel, Fortnite Chapter 5 Season 4 is themed after Marvel superheroes, and with a special focus on Doctor Doom, a major villain in Marvel Comics. There’s also a Doctor Doom skin reportedly set to arrive, alongside a Black Cat Fortnite skin. 

The post Fortnite downtime for v31.10 revealed; Here’s when Fortnite servers will be back online appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Fortnite downtime for v31.10 revealed; Here’s when Fortnite servers will be back online

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
What better way to celebrate a new Disney Dreamlight Valley event than to try new recipes? During the End of Summer event, you'll unlock the final piece to cooking roasted marshmallows and s'mores, with the latter requiring a few extra ingredients.


Disney Dreamlight Valley S'mores recipe


Disney Dreamlight Valley's s'mores recipe is a four-star dish requiring the following ingredients:



Blue marshmallow 


Pink marshmallow 


Wheat (2)



You may notice it's similar to the recipe for roasted marshmallows. The only difference is that you need only one of each marshmallow and two wheat for the graham crackers. Once you have each item, use them in the Chez Remy kitchen or any nearby stove to make your s'mores dish.


Roasted marshmallows and s'mores are the only two meals you can use to …
articles.title: How to make S’mores in Disney Dreamlight Valley

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Disney Dreamlight Valley's End of Summer event is here, and with it comes marshmallows and a lot of camping equipment. However, to access the new camping furniture and finish the event's Dreamlight duties, you'll need to make some special dishes, including a batch of roasted marshmallows.


Disney Dreamlight Valley Roasted Marshmallow recipe


In Disney Dreamlight Valley, roasted marshmallows are a four-star dish requiring the following ingredients:



Blue marshmallow (2)


Pink marshmallow (2)



That's right; you need two of each marshmallow type to make this particular dish. Once you have two of each marshmallow, toss them into a cooking pot alongside a piece of coal to make your toasty roasted marshmallow dish. Now, you can share them with villagers for the Share Some Sweetness task o…
articles.title: How to make Roasted Marshmallows in Disney Dreamlight Valley

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
One of the important questlines in World of Warcraft: The War Within is Chapter 5 of the main campaign questline for expansion. This quest not only pushes the story forward but is also the final requisite to unlock the Earthen Allied Race. Here is how to start and complete the A Light in the Dark quest in WoW The War Within.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to start A Light in the Dark quest


In order to start the quest A Light in the Dark you must head to Dornogal. You must have also already completed the previous four chapter quests in the endgame main campaign storyline for The War Within. Here are the four chapter quests you must complete prior to starting the A Light in the Dark quest:



Chapter 1: Against the Current


Chapter 2: Ties that Bind


Chapter 3: News from Below


Chapter 4: The Machines March to War



Upon completing the Machines March to War, you will be able to start the fifth and final chapter which is A Light in the Dark. Head to Dornogal and speak with Allerica, who then sends you to the Aegis Wall in Hallowfall to speak with General Steelstrike. If you were unable to get that quest before today, don't worry; it was time-gated and just unlocked on September 3 during the weekly reset.


How to complete the A Light in the Dark quest


I'll avoid spoilers, but once you speak to General Steelstrike you'll complete a couple of quests before receiving the actual quest you are looking for, A Light in the Dark, from Anduin Wrynn. He will task you with chasing down the villain of the expansion and defeating her. Once you complete this quest, you will have to return back to Alleria Windrunner.


Upon doing so you will complete the A Light in the Dark quest and also conclude the endgame campaign questline for The War Within. Finally, if you've done all the other requirements to unlock The Earthen, which were possible before now, you will officially unlock the Allied Race.

The post How to start and complete A Light in the Dark quest in WoW The War Within appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to start and complete A Light in the Dark quest in WoW The War Within

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Marshmallows are one of the most peculiar ingredients in Disney Dreamlight Valley due to their specific spawn requirements. While they originally appeared as a collection log entry during the Dapper Delights update, they need another event to begin before you can harvest them, making them unobtainable until a particular date.


Where to find marshmallows in Disney Dreamlight Valley


Pink and blue marshmallows are items you'll find during Disney Dreamlight Valley's End of Summer event from September 4 to 26, 2024. During these few weeks, you'll spot pink marshmallow bushes in the Plaza and blue marshmallows scattered around the following biomes:



Plaza


Peaceful Meadow


Dazzle Beach


Forest of Valor


Glade of Trust



Pink marshmallows are easier to find than their blue counterparts,…
articles.title: How to get marshmallows in Disney Dreamlight Valley

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Many players logged into this week's reset of World of Warcraft: The War Within anxious to pick their weekly quest only to discover the quest had been chosen for them. Everyone has received the quest Archives: The First Disc this week which is either a bug or an underthought due to this being the final week before the season begins. Here is how you can complete the Archives: The First Disc weekly quest in WoW The War Within to finish your weekly.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Fastest way to get Discs and complete Archives: The First Disc quest


The fastest way to actually complete the weekly Archives: The First Disc quest seems to be just running dungeons with followers. You need 10 discs in total, and running The Rookery, for example, with your followers, will net you 15 Discs per boss k…
articles.title: How to complete the Archives: The First Disc weekly quest in WoW The War Within

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
The latest update for World of Stands added some new Stands and reworked a lot of the balance around existing ones. In fact, Update 3 added three new Stands, one of each rarity, that has really shaken up the meta. We've put together this extensive World of Stands Tier List for all Stands to know which of the 17 you should strive for.


Screenshot by Destructoiid


World of Stands Tier List for all Stands


With 17 total Stands in World of Stands, there is a lot of variety and disparity in terms of balance between all of them. Typically speaking, Stands of higher rarity—there are currently three rarities, Common, Rare, and Legendary—are the stronger options. However, at each rarity, there are better Stands than others, and the rarity alone does not guarantee a specific level of strength.


Stands we've put in the S Tier are currently in the best spot and should be the ones you are striving for as soon as possible. Those in the A Tier are also strong options and can be used without issue until you're able to get your hands on a Stand in the S Tier. The Stands in the B Tier may have specific situations in which they shine and can be used until you find a Stand in the S or A Tier. Finally, the Stands in the C Tier are a bit lacking at the moment, which is understandable as they are all of Common rarity. As such, you should try to replace them as soon as possible.


Here is our World of Stands Tier List for all Stands as of Update 3:


S Tier



Anubis Chariot (Legendary)


Killer Queen (Legendary)


King Crimson (Legendary)


Star Platinum (Legendary)


The World (Legendary)



A Tier



Crazy Diamond (Legendary)


Gold Experience (Legendary)


Magician's Red (Rare)


Silver Chariot (Rare)


Weather Report (Rare)



B Tier



Anubis (Common)


Death 13 (Common)


Sticky Report (Rare)


The Sun (Common)



C Tier



The Hand (Common)


Red Hot Chili Pepper (Common)


Echoes (Common)


The post World of Stands Tier List appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: World of Stands Tier List

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
Reggie Games, the creator and publisher of the hugely popular Primal: The Awakening board game, has announced that it's opening a Primal Boutique Store. The store will stock every product from the Kickstarter campaign and future expansions in 2025. 


Products go live on the Primal Boutique Store on September 17, 2024. Reggie Games has chosen to independently reprint Primal: The Awakening and create a dedicated space that exclusively serves the game, and everything planned for it in the future. The game's Kickstarter campaign asked for roughly £150,000 in 2021 and received over £2 million by the time it closed. If that doesn't show that the game hit home with thousands of board game fans, I don't know what does. 


The only boss-battler you'll ever need


Image via Reggie Games


Primal: T…
articles.title: A dedicated Primal: The Awakening store offers all Kickstarter rewards to fans later this month

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Black Myth: Wukong borrows a lot from Souls games like difficulty and bosses, but does it have a New Game Plus? Is there more to this game beyond the credits without starting an entirely new save file? This is what you need to know.


Does Black Myth: Wukong have New Game Plus?


Yes, Black Myth: Wukong has a New Game Plus mode. After reaching the initial credits, you’ll be sent back to the main menu. You’ll have the option to “Continue Journey” which is go back to your current save, or “Enter a New Cycle” which is the game’s lingo for New Game Plus.


It’s ideal that you go back to your current Journey and complete anything you may have missed. This includes secret areas, optional bosses, and side quests that are still able to be completed. You’d also want to scour areas for any unopened …
articles.title: Does Black Myth: Wukong have New Game Plus? Explained

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Hailey has become an instant fan-favorite in The First Descendant, so if you are looking for the best build for her to melt (but technically freeze) bosses, we have you covered. Her kit revolves around ranged play and accuracy, so we’ll break down everything you need.


Best Hailey build in The First Descendant


To start, let’s put a mod setup to start focusing on her strengths. This will focus mostly on her Singular damage. Here’s the setup to get started:


Best Hailey mod setup



Increased HP


Spear and Shield


Front Lines


Emergency Measures


Skill Insight


Skill Concentration


Shot Focus


Chill Specialist


Glacial Syncytium


Strong Mentality or Frugal Mindset



This build for Hailey implies that the mods you’re using are maxed or almost at max rank to have the greatest eff…
articles.title: The First Descendant: Best Hailey build and loadout

articles.description:
After 10 years, Elder Scrolls Online is still going strong. It will remind you of that like clockwork, as each year it kicks off events both new and old. Hopefully, we can help you manage your schedule.


Below is an outline of events scheduled for ESO both tentative and concrete. Some have passed, some haven’t been announced, some have, and others we can predict because they’re annual. Here is all the details on what’s happening in Tamriel.


Ongoing events in 2024



Anniversary Spotlight: Dungeon Runners, Rise Up (September 1 - September 30)



Upcoming events in 2024

Expired

Battlegrounds Crazy King Mini Event (August 15–August 20)


…
articles.title: Every scheduled ESO event, ongoing and scheduled for 2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
This weekend, popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy went 'offline' displaying an image that some interpreted as a farewell message. Today the site returned and uploads at third-party sites resumed simultaneously. This is the second time in a few weeks that the site has gone through this mysterious cycle. The main question that remains: Why?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy is Back Online & Uploads Resume

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After obtaining an injunction and an invasive search and seizure order at Canada's Federal Court, teams from Bell, Rogers, Disney, Paramount, Columbia, and Warner Bros. targeted the alleged operators of IPTV service SmoothStreams at their homes in Canada. The defendants were charged with contempt of court when they failed to comply with the terms of the order. Two years later, the defendants are paying a heavy price and the main case hasn't even started.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bell, Rogers & MPA’s Pirate IPTV Lawsuit is a Slow-Motion Money Pit Nightmare

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Nhentai, a popular adult site with dozens of millions of monthly visits, has been sued for copyright infringement. The lawsuit was filed by California company PCR Distributing, which operates several hentai brands. The complaint alleges that nhentai doesn't respond to takedown notices. The site attempted to settle the dispute confidentially months ago, but that attempt failed. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Pirate’ Site nHentai Sued in U.S. Court for Copyright Infringement

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A co-founder of a group, formed to raise awareness of "damaging" religious instruction received by schoolchildren in the U.S., now has support from the Electronic Frontier Foundation. After Zachary Parrish published the LifeWise Academy's children's curriculum on the website of 'Parents Against LifeWise' he was sued for copyright infringement. In support of a motion to dismiss, EFF says that copyright law isn't a tool to silence critics and a fair use defense will prevail.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: EFF Assists Critic’s Fair Use Defense Over Kids’ Religious Program ‘Leak’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cheat seller AimJunkies has suffered two new setbacks in its legal battle with 'Destiny 2' developer Bungie. The Seattle District Court refused to overturn a jury verdict issued in May and will not grant a new trial. Separately, the Court of Appeals affirmed a $4.3 million arbitration award, concluding that no clear errors were made and that the scale of the award is not “completely irrational”
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Denies Cheat Seller AimJunkies a New Trial, Affirms Bungie’s $4.3m Win

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Inside Out 2' tops the chart, followed by 'Borderlands'. 'Trap' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 09/02/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The spectacular demise of Fmovies, Aniwave, and a dozen or more related big-brand pirate sites, has former users asking the same question: Are they really gone forever? With many resurrections and Dr. Who-like regenerations over recent years, some seem optimistic. Government records suggests that business bridges are being built from Hollywood to Vietnam, and back again. It seems unlikely that the resurrection of pirate sites would help in any way.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies & Aniwave: Will The Masters of Pirate Resurrection Rise Again?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy once again confuses users with a mysterious message. Instead of the usual list of downloads, it simply shows an image from the film Logan and the brief message "TG Forever". This is similar to a notice that appeared on the site a few weeks ago, after which it eventually resumed business as usual. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy Spooks Users with More ‘Downtime’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Earlier this month, U.S. law enforcement seized several domain names belonging to popular sports streaming site Streameast. However, instead of shutting down operations, the site is fighting back. After launching new backup domains, the site's operators inform TorrentFreak that they plan to challenge the seizure warrant in court.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sports Streaming Site Streameast Plans to Appeal U.S. Domain Name Seizures

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Despite malware having an even worse reputation than piracy, until now police operations to take sites down, explicitly because they're involved in both, have been pretty much non-existent. This week, music industry group IFPI revealed Operation Redirect, "the first operation of its kind in Brazil to target illegal sites associated with malware distribution." Intrigued by the announcement, we took a closer look and found plenty of drama.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Operation Redirect: Police Anti-Malware Action Protects Music & Pirates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Fmovies, one of the most popular pirate streaming sites of recent times, disappeared a few weeks ago. No credit was taken by authorities or rightsholders, not even when related giants including AniWave fell this week. Today, initial suspicions are confirmed; anti-piracy group ACE says it assisted Vietnamese authorities to shut down the piracy ring. In parallel, the Vietnamese Government is organizing a promo tour in Hollywood.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies Piracy Ring Was Shut Down by Vietnam, Assisted By ACE

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A copyright lawsuit, filed in June by the world's largest educational publishers, accused Google of promoting pirate sites and profiting from piracy, among other things. This week Google responded to the Cengage Learning-led complaint with a motion to dismiss all but one of the publishers' claims, describing them as "tacked on" as part of a "kitchen-sink pleading strategy."
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Asks Court to Gut “Kitchen Sink” Lawsuit Claiming it Profits From Piracy

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Fmovies was once the world's most popular pirate streaming site. Then mid-June, after years of smooth sailing, it vanished into thin air. Sites with over a billion annual visits tend not to throw everything away so easily. Yet last night, a site with close to two billion visits disappeared in similar circumstances, rapidly followed by another, and then many others after that. In the absence of an official announcement, earlier today we took an early sift through the wreckage.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Sites, Billions of Visits, Wiped Out in Hours: Sifting the Fmovies Wreckage

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
After the recent shutdown of Fmovies, right now an entire streaming empire is collapsing. Big name casualties include Fboxz.to, Aniwave.to, Anix.to, AnimeSuge, Zoroxtv, the list goes on. In a message displayed on their homepages, visitors are advised to use legal options from now on. The exact same message appeared when 123movies threw in the towel a few years ago. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Streaming Giants Fboxz, AniWave, Zoroxtv & Others Dead in Major Collapse

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Claims that Italy will launch Piracy Shield 2.0 at the end of the year appear to be overly optimistic. With just four months left of 2024, a software supplier hasn't even been chosen yet. With the current system falling over, previously blocked domains and IP addresses are being unblocked to make room for new ones, something that the law has no provision for. Meanwhile, smart TV manufacturers will soon be asked to ban a VPN app from their sets.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield 2.0 in Doubt For 2024 , TV Manufacturers Urged to Ban VPN

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Do you know someone who sells dodgy streaming boxes or pirate IPTV streams? In Ireland, anti-piracy group FACT in partnership with Crimestoppers would like you to 'report' this activity. These 'snitch' initiatives are not widely embraced by the public but with a six-week social media push, the campaign aims to identity new enforcement targets.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pssst… Want to Snitch on Sellers of Pirate Streaming Services?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
"House of the Dragon" is one of the most watched TV series, particularly among pirates. The second season ended earlier this month after the eighth episode, though many fans had hoped for more. Pirates who downloaded the unexpected 'House of the Dragon S02E09' release got a surprise bonus, but not the one they were hoping for. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Bonus’ Episode of ‘House of the Dragon’ Comes With a Nasty Surprise for Pirates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular pirate streaming site Fmovies shut down this summer, with several sister sites following suit. These sites were redirected to new streaming portals, purportedly operated by different individuals. This caught the attention of anti-piracy group ACE, which obtained a DMCA subpoena this week to unmask the people behind these new sites.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Goes After Fmovies Sister Site ‘Successors’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Taiwan's Criminal Investigation Bureau (CIB) has carried out a successful raid against a pirate IPTV provider that had been capturing broadcasters' content for at least two years. Authorities say the operation was hidden in a house with an outward appearance of being abandoned years ago. Among 279 items seized were 72 set-top boxes, 72 video encoders, servers, networking hardware, bank books, and mobile phones.  Two suspects were arrested.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Raid: 150+ Encoders, STBs, and Servers Seized, Operators Arrested

Support for Pixel 9 Series Devices
You can now test your apps on the Google Pixel 9 series device configurations. Android Studio and the latest Android Emulator now have device definitions for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL, and the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, enabling you to validate your apps on these virtual devices to ensure they react correctly to a variety of screen sizes and device types. You should use API 35 with the Pixel 9 AVDs to ensure the best experience and access to the latest platform features.

articles.description:
Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Canary 4 is now available in the Canary channel.
If you already have an Android Studio build on the Canary channel,
you can get the update by clicking Help > Check for Updates (or Android Studio > Check
for Updates on macOS). Otherwise, you can download it here.
For information on new features and changes in Android Studio Ladybug, see the Android Studio Preview release notes.

For details of bugs fixed in each previous release of Android Studio Ladybug, see
closed issues.
General fixes and features
Below is a list of general fixes in Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Canary 4 and Android Gradle Plugin 8.7.0-alpha04. These are a result of your bug
reports, which help us to make Android Studio better. If you encounter a problem, let us know by reporting a bug. You can also vote for an existing issue to indicate that it also affects
you.
